title: ♪ Wayne Allen Rut ♪ ♪ Why would Obama lose in a landslide ♪
subtitle: Wayne Allen Rut thought that President Obama would lose the bid for his re-election in 2012 due to a crushing collapse.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Wayne Allen Rut thought that President Obama would lose the bid for his re-election in 2012 due to a crushing collapse.
